thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Sharon
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text:
<24 hours delivery on products which is great.
Mismatch in sizing categorisation within children's shoes can make it difficult to determine what size is correct.
Issue occurs between baby and toddler shoe sizes. Some brands have 1 size linked to the european size, other brands have a different size related to the same european size.
Offer a great range of childrens shoes with lots of options outside of the standard Clarke's. One of very few shops in the country offering the range.
